alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 7:37PM CDT until April 23 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN DONIPHAN...NORTHWESTERN LEAVENWORTH...EASTERN ATCHISON...WESTERN BUCHANAN AND NORTHWESTERN PLATTE COUNTIES... At 736 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rushville to near Easton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Leavenworth, Atchison, Weston, Wathena, Elwood, Rushville, Easton, Tracy, Lewis And Clark Village, Doniphan, De Kalb, Iatan, St. Joseph Airport, Fort Leavenworth, Faucett, Bean Lake, Lewis And Clark Vi, Beverly and Lowemont. This includes Interstate 229 between mile markers 3 and 4. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
